message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI 

Reasoning: The paper deals with inferring object sizes using visual and textual information, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of web data for learning also suggests information retrieval (cs.IR) as a possible sub-category. The paper also mentions the lack of a comprehensive repository of size information, which could be addressed using machine learning techniques such as deep learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
